dashboard.title: Hi! I'm Francisco Bermudez ðŸ‘‹
dashboard.subtitle: Frontend Developer & Mobile App Enthusiast
dashboard.descripcionOne: I develop my career as a specialist in Frontend and mobile applications, bringing a strategic vision thanks to my background in Communication to design attractive, intuitive, and functional interfaces.
dashboard.descripcionTwo: I have solid experience in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, as well as modern frameworks like React.js and React Native, and component libraries like Material-UI (MUI). Additionally, I integrate AI tools to optimize prototypes and workflows.
dashboard.descripcionThree: My role encompasses both technical implementation and product definition and strategic planning, ensuring that each version meets business objectives and provides a consistent and scalable user experience.

tareas: Developing a website using Next.js, Typescript and Tailwind CSS.
Building a mobile app with React Native and Tailwind CSS.
Applying best practices and optimizing components for scalability.
Designing graphical interfaces based on Figma designs.
Migrating the platform to React.js using Typescript and Bootstrap.
Applying best practices and optimizing components for scalability.
Designing graphical interfaces based on Figma layouts.
Dataset generation focused on platforms worldwide.
Development of informative and interactive dashboards to showcase the obtained data.

fullstack.description: Program focused on full-stack web application development, covering backend APIs with Node.js and NoSQL databases, as well as modern frontend interfaces with React. Includes best practices, testing, and deployment.

frontend.description: Intensive modern frontend development course focused on React and Next.js. Covered concepts like reusable components, routing, API consumption, and scalable project structures.

analytics.description: Training in business data analysis. Included advanced SQL Server queries, report generation, and interactive dashboards with Power BI for data-driven decision making.
